segments.text: I see by your resume that you have been working ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have worked for four years with a Canadian Company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me what you know about our company , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Mark Smith , who was the first president , founded the company in Ottawa in 1955 . It has 1.5 billion dollars in capital.it employs 8,000 people , and it is the largest company in its field in Canada .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you know about our major products and our share of the market ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your company's products are mostly marketed in Canada and the United States , but particularly have sold very well here in China . So I think in the future you'll find China to be a profitable market as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What made you decide to change your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because I want to change my working environment and seek new challenges .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I like it very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important qualification for a salesperson ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it is confidence in himself and his products .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with you . Do you have any questions to ask about this job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to know something about the salary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the starting salary for a salesperson is between 1,500 - 2,000 Yuan . But the specific number will be determined according to your sales .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When can I get the final decision ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We cannot reach a final decision until we have talked to all of the other five applicants . Anyhow , we'll contact you within this month . All right . Nice meeting you . Good-bye .
segments.speaker: S1
